# Abstract /Key ideas 

Changing requires plating good seeds (more adaptive persepctives) in fertile soil in which those seeds can grow (a context with appropriate affordances)

The success of wise interventions depends on features of contexts that make an adaptive persepctive possible, what we call psychological affordances
